txt.en: Elrond of Rivendell has sent scouts into Eregion to cover the path of the Company of the Ring and also to drive forth the spies of Saruman the White from the ancient home of the Noldor in Middle-earth.
You have garnered great aid to the Elves in Eregion as they sought to hide the passage of the Company of the Ring and now turn their attentions to the evil that has laid claim to their home of old.
